about_the_game:
You are playing the game as Bit who is trapped in a ghost infested mansion. Equipped with only a flashlight, you have to race against the clock as you navigate through a haunted mansion avoiding swarms of ghostly creatures and gaining experience while fighting for your survival. Will you be able to outsmart the ghosts and lead the high score in this intense survival game?

Features :
- Earn points by killing ghosts.
The more enemies you killed in a session, the more points you will earn.

- Spend points to upgrade your skills.
Spend points wisely to keep you one step ahead of the enemies.

- Survive as long as you can.
Lead the score and beat the people around the world.

- Active monthly event.
Win prizes for monthly event.
